name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
On October 24, Hunan Normal University will hold a lecture on "Confucian Marxism"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 21, Japan. The incidents of farmers in many parts of China rushing into other people's fields to grab peanuts and corn have been reported by many Japanese media.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
The girl said that she has resigned and cannot comment on the incident.
Her video has been deleted, including the post on the school forum. The original follow-up post was deleted by the school and replaced with a positive thank you from Fuzhou Unicom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A new type of hacking mode has appeared in Telegram. The hacker will send a hacking SMS following the real Telegram SMS. At present, some overseas dissidents have been hacked.
Please be cautious. Please set up a second login verification for Telegram. Check the website URL before opening any link. Do not scan QR codes from unknown sources.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 16, Chongqing. The former principal of Kaiming Experimental School used a loudspeaker to protest against the acquisition of school funds in front of the Communist Party branch committee of the Institute of Education and Science Bashu Experimental School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 16, Qinzhou, Guangxi. Villagers in Wuli Town, Lingshan County protested against the developer blocking the road

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 19, an internet celebrity released a video showing that he met a Japanese tourist in Nepal. Because the other party did not understand Chinese, the internet celebrity pretended to have a friendly conversation with the other party, but in fact he kept calling the other party a "little Jap devil" in Chinese.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 22, Haishu District, Ningbo, Zhejiang. A mother was sending her daughter to school when she was chased and hacked by a man with a knife. Police report: 2 people were injured, and the suspect Tao (male, 50 years old) was arrested on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 21, Jiangsu. Blogger "Ming Ren Ming Yan" imitated Professor Zhang Weiwei to talk about why young people don't want to have children and dare not have children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangdong, a netizen was afraid to tell his family that he was unemployed, so he could only stay in the corridor every day and pretend to go to work. Today is the 291st day that he pretended to go to work. Many people in the comment area said that they had the same experience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Last October, a Chinese woman (Ye Ting) caused a death in a drunk driving accident in Seattle, USA. While receiving treatment in the hospital, she secretly boarded a plane to Canada and then fled back to China. The Washington State Police formally applied for a red warrant from Interpol. However, a year after the incident, someone discovered that the woman acted as if nothing had happened and continued to show off her beautiful life on Xiaohongshu. After being recognized, she cleared all the posts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 21, the China Social Security Association interpreted the "2023 Individual Tax Clearance Data Report" and came to the following conclusions:
Among the 720 million employed people in China;
There are 600 million people with a monthly salary of less than 3,500 yuan.
There are only 20 million people with an annual salary of more than 100,000 yuan
There are only 8 million people with an annual salary of more than 150,000 yuan
There are only 700,000 people with an annual salary of more than 1 million yuan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Yu Tao, once named "National Excellent People's Policeman", deputy director of Harbin Public Security Bureau, deputy department-level leader, is actually a gangster boss! Recently, Jixi City Public Security Bureau cracked down on a gangster group headed by Yu Tao and others, and is now soliciting criminal clues from the public. In the photos released by the police, Yu Tao is ranked first.
Netizen: Which gangster is not backed by a policeman? Otherwise, there would be no gangs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the Saudi media "Middle East News", in order to prevent the new leader from being assassinated again, senior Hamas figures currently in the Gaza Strip and abroad "almost unanimously agreed to keep the identity of the next leader secret."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 21, Shanghai. A Japanese restaurant was criticized by the patriotic internet celebrity "一朵莲" for writing the word "神" on the lantern outside the door. The internet celebrity said that the "神" on the lantern was the god of the Yasukuni Shrine. If you don't take down the lantern, call the Ministry of State Security to report it. Passing tourists saw this and scolded the internet celebrity for being mentally ill.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 22, the United States. Blogger "Mark" posted a video to show everyone the ballot in his hand and popularize the role of the ballot. Netizens responded: "This is the first time I have seen a ballot. It turns out that citizens have so many powers." "In China, everything is arranged directly." "Blindly guess that this video will not be available tomorrow."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On October 19, Tianjin Institute of Physical Education. A student from Sports Class 5 reported the problem of no hot water in the dormitory in the student group, which resonated with his classmates.
As a result, he was criticized by the teacher in the group, saying that he made private comments in the professional notification group, causing adverse effects. He also said that students who followed suit should not come to him to solve any problems in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, Gao'an City, Jiangxi Province. A villager said that the government wanted to build a new countryside, so the village committee asked the villagers to donate 1,000 yuan each. "For example, our family of five has to donate a total of 6,000 yuan," and there was no receipt after the donation. The villager also said that their village was on the list of poor villages. Some netizens in the comment area reminded him that the construction of the new countryside is funded by the government and the villagers do not need to pay a penny.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 20, Zibo, Shandong. A woman deposited more than 400,000 yuan in Zibo Qishang Bank. When she withdrew money, she found that the balance was zero. After printing the bank statement, she found that every amount of money deposited into the bank card at the counter was withdrawn on the same day without the depositor's knowledge. It is understood that this kind of problem involves more than 100 depositors. Bank customer service: verification is being processed, and depositors with deposit insurance can receive up to 500,000 yuan in compensation.
